main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Bellevue, Ohio on 2 Dec 1967, where the observer described a saucer-shaped craft with lights.
interesting points: The observer reported seeing a saucer-shaped craft with lights on the bottom and red lights on the sides., They attempted to follow the object with several friends but ultimately lost sight of it., The sighting lasted for about 10 to 15 minutes., The witness described an unusual odor and warmth in the car during the sighting., No other witnesses reported seeing the same object on that night.
witness description: The main witness was a student who reported the sighting and attempted to follow the object with friends.
